articles.title: Workers at Canadian Tire factories overseas paid poverty wages, labour groups allege - CBC News
articles.description: Canadian labour groups have filed a complaint with a federal corporate watchdog saying Canadian Tire failed to ensure workers in its South Asian supplier factories are paid a living wage.
